Text.Value: Then sounds like I have everything I need - more of life than I'd ever imagined possible, without Shar.

EditorData.NodeContext: Romantic. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: I want to grow flowers. I want to be surrounded by colours, every day. I'm tired of darkness.

EditorData.NodeContext: More impassioned. Definining what she wants from life. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: Fair. What else do you have in mind?
What more could I need? If I had all that, and I had you... that's more of a life that I ever dared to dream of.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: Anything else?
I've never been able to write my own future. I wouldn't even know where to begin.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: I was going to save the best until last, but to put your mind at ease - yes. I want to share everything that lies ahead of me with you. If you're willing, of course.

EditorData.NodeContext: Gently teasing. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: That's not even all - there's the githyanki to consider, whatever Raphael is cooking up, the refugee crisis...
I don't think it's what happens if we fail that concerns me - we'll be beyond our worries at that point. I think what bothers me is what happens if we succeed...

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: Well, we've plenty to be anxious about. The tadpoles, the armies of the Absolute...
There's nothing wrong with the city. You grew up here.
Please stop reminding me of things to worry about. I'd like to get some sleep tonight.

EditorData.NodeContext: Mild annoyance at the player's joking list of things to worry about.

Text.Value: It doesn't have to be a daunting prospect. Just dream about what you'd like.
Go on...
I think I'd like to put Shar behind me, and find somewhere peaceful. Away from the city, perhaps.

EditorData.NodeContext: Dreaming  of the future (parents not yet known to be alive) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: I'd like to find somewhere peaceful, with my parents close by. Away from the city, perhaps.

EditorData.NodeContext: Dreaming of the future. (parents lived) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: Don't stop now. What else?
Let's see how we fare. Perhaps I'll get a better offer.
I'd like room for animals. Lots of them - all shapes and sizes, so long as they appreciate a warm fire and more affection than they know what to do with.

EditorData.NodeContext: Dreaming of the future. Warming up to it. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: And what about me?
Is there room for me in this fresh start?
Of course I'm willing.
A better offer? You're lucky you're handsome and that I know you're joking.
A better offer? You're lucky you're pretty and that I know you're joking.
A better offer? You're lucky you're dashing and that I know you're joking.

EditorData.NodeContext: Mild, jokey annoyance. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: Yes... I want to share it all with you, if you're willing.

EditorData.NodeContext: Romantic/slightly nervous. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: I know, just teasing. Tell me what's on your mind.
Since we arrived in the city, I can't help but feel a little... anxious. But I'm not sure I know why.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little preoccupied. Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: Well, I want to save my parents, of course. Take them away, far from Shar's influence. Someplace peaceful - away from the city, perhaps.

EditorData.NodeContext: Dreaming of  the future (parents known to be alive/not yet saved) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: Thank you. Now I have plenty of specifics to worry about. That wasn't what I meant, though...
How can I help?
Start at the beginning. Imagine it's the day after we defeat Absolute. What then?
I'd like to find somewhere peaceful. Somewhere I can feel close to my parents' spirits. Away from the city, perhaps.

EditorData.NodeContext: Dreaming of the future (parents died) Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Text.Value: I did... after I was abducted. Perhaps if we survive all of this, a fresh start would be for the best.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Rejected Shar path. SH has turned on her goddess. Future is unclear for her in a way that's a little daunting.

Synopsis: Shadowheart is back in her 'home city' but doesn't really remember much of it. With the player's help/tag reactivity (baldurian inside info etc), they discuss a future they could have together. Forget the obstacles ahead for a while and dream of what post-victory life might be like (foreshadow romance fate)
